title: 【Upgraded】KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids, Electronic Light-up Dance Pad with Wireless Bluetooth 5 Speeds 9 Levels, Dancing Mat for Toddlers Music Game Dance Toy for Girls Boys 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 10+ Year Old
descriptions:
KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids — Bluetooth Music, LED Scoring, 5 Speeds, 9 Levels, Extra-Large 39x41 inches

Bring active fun home with the KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids, an extra-large, cushioned play mat that gets kids moving, thinking, and smiling. With upgraded Bluetooth 5 connectivity, multiple game modes, and a soft, non-slip design, it’s the perfect blend of music, movement, and learning for ages 3–12.

Key Features
- Upgraded Bluetooth 5: Pair with smartphones or other Bluetooth-enabled devices to play your child’s favorite songs for freestyle or game mode dance sessions.
- 3 Play Modes: Free Dance, Memory Mode, and Bluetooth Mode keep play fresh, fun, and challenging.
- 5 Speeds, 9 Difficulty Levels: Progressively increase challenge to match your child’s pace and skill level.
- LED Score Display and Volume Keys: Real-time scoring keeps kids motivated; easy volume control for parent-friendly play.
- Extra-Large Size: 39 x 41 inches gives ample room to dance, jump, and groove without stepping off the mat.
- Safe, Durable Materials: Soft, cushioned surface on high-quality, non-toxic, odorless vinyl that’s waterproof and easy to wipe clean. Non-slip silicone particles on the base keep the mat in place on most floors.
- No Weight Restrictions: Built for active play across a wide age range.

Age Range
- Suitable for ages 3–5, 5–8, and 8–12. Scalable speeds and levels make it engaging for siblings to share.

Benefits for Kids
- Encourages active play and exercise.
- Enhances physical coordination and rhythm.
- Boosts memory and observational skills through pattern and sequence games.
- Supports confidence and teamwork during group play.

Gifting Made Easy
- A standout gift for birthdays, Christmas, and Children’s Day. Ideal for rainy days, playdates, parties, and family game nights.

What’s Needed
- Power: 4 AA batteries (not included).

In the Box
- KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids (39 x 41 inches)
- Quick-start instructions

Why Parents Love It
- Wireless connectivity for custom playlists, simple controls, and a safe, soft build designed for active kids. Waterproof and easy to clean for everyday use.

Let the music play and the dancing begin with the KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids—where fitness meets fun and learning through movement.
